page.title: 03A day in my life.
page.content: Today is a Tuesday 4th June 1985. I get up at quarter past eight and watch Tv.am. and at half past eight I set off for school and I get to school at five to nine.The bell rings at nine- o- clock. When we get in we go in the hall for our assembly, then when we come out we go straight to maths until playtime.In our maths lesson we work from "Scottish Maths" workbooks. Then we do some creative writing. After dinner we do sewing until playtime,I am making a little doll. After playtime we have a story on the radio. After school I play with my friend.
